title: Couscous salad
ingredients: ['175g of dried couscous', 'boiling water', '1 tsp vegetable stock granules', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '1/2 red pepper, finely diced', '1/2 orange pepper, finely diced', '1 tomato, finely diced', '1/2 cucumber, finely diced', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'pinch of salt']
